thread.title: Pandora to Cut 5% of Workforce

author: Anne Steele
title: Pandora to Cut 5% of Workforce
text:
Pandora Media Inc. will lay off 5% of its workforce as the internet radio company tries to rein in costs while investing in advertising technology and efforts to woo back listeners.
Shares, which have declined 63% over the past 12 months as the company contends with a declining user base and management shake-up, rose 3.7% after hours in New York.
